Posts.Content: Hi, I'm writing an article about the sexual breast cancer ads. I need to do a phone/video/live interview with someone before Wednesday about the topic. Some say that these ads catch attention and do raise awareness about breast cancer. Others say that it's merely an attention-grabbing tactic that achieves nothing, besides getting guys aroused. What do you think? How do these ads affect you? Here are a couple of articles to update you on the issue: http://www.newser.com/story/156736/breast-cancer-survivors-s Let me know if you're interested in an interview. Thanks!
Posts.Title: What do you think about ads that sexualize cancer?
